TopicTitle: Game Breaking Bug - Can't launch from SPH

Articles.Content:
When I try to launch a plane from the SPH, the game gets stuck like this...

Can't move camera or anything but kerbals still wandering around...

How do I fix this?!
Please read the [thread=92230]Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide[/thread]. We'll need your output_log.txt to help.

[quote name='Slothception']How do you solve this? ;d[/QUOTE]

Well that is going to depend on what broke it, as this isn't normal and isn't known.

We must have your output_log.txt, it's in KSP_Data and you can upload it to dropbox.

Also it would help to have the save file, and the steps that were made before this happened.

Or you could just restart KSP and see if it goes away.

Gonna take a shot in the dark and say that OPs "Kerbal Space Program\saves\OPs_savefile\Ships\SPH" folder doesn't exist. It's fine when building it, but when you hit launch, it tries to save Auto-Saved Ship.craft to that folder which doesn't exist and then things get borked up.
Oh yeah, that could happen if he's put KSP on the desktop but doesn't have an admin account, but it wouldn't break the camera. Edited November 21, 2015 by sal_vager
